channel.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
channel.description:
[size=20pt]Hi i am give co-owner to whoever helpz me. i have a pk server :|
0k my problem is when i try to change the npc's what they say. it doesnt work. when i log into the server. [u]ok this is what u do ::[/u] i open up npchandler.java searched up moo and i scrolled down and wrote what the npc what it gotta say and the id and stuff. i compile and rune . it still says ''Zammy Mage is Offline'' WHY CANT I CHANGE IT !!!!!!!!!!!!! oh and i have l337 source [/size]

item.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

omg,

Sorry dude, i dont know what else to do without going through your NPCHandler…

Sorry I tried all I could

Hope you get your problem fixed

-Newb

Read full topic

item.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

[quote=“wtx pk3r, post:15, topic:35859”]when i log in the chearleaders still say the same shit…
nothing new.[/quote]

Delete the “Zammy mage is online\offline” crap you can’t have them saying 2 different things unless you add a diff bracket etc

Also, make sure the ID is right, because there could be more than 1 different type of cheerleader.

for example

There is about 50 different ID’s for gnomes. So make sure you have the correct one…

-Newbi

Read full topic

item.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“wtx pk3r, post:6, topic:35859”]i did but no work[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 10:12:24 AM[/size][hr][code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 494) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“admin rage”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner admin rage is Online! Wooo!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner admin rage is offline…damit”;
}
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “We love ragescape!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “We love admin rage so much!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”; //MADE
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 33) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”; //BY
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 37) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to tzhaar caves”; //admin rage
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Weapons and shit here!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Ragescape pwnz j00!!”;
}
}

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1201) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "DO YOU DARE ENTER THE BLACK DRAGONS LAIR?";
					}
				}
				
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "GO THROUGH THIS DOOR TO TELEPORT TO THE BLACK DRAGON CAVE";
					}
				}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2301) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to the monkey playboy mansion";
					}
				}
									if (npcs[i].npcType == 2475) {
					if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ragescape";
					}
				}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) {
					if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get ya pots and pk stuff here!";
					}
				}[/code]

[glow=red,2,300]NO Work !!![/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 10:15:46 AM[/size][hr]freeaeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaakzor someone help …[/quote]

Make sure the NPC Id is correct. (636) for the first

item.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Its really not that hard…
Copy and past everything you posted and delete now paste this in there…

[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “We love ragescape!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “We love admin rage so much!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 494) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“admin rage”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner admin rage is Online! Wooo!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner admin rage is offline…damit”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”; //MADE
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 33) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”; //BY
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 37) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to tzhaar caves”; //admin rage
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Tele to varrock”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;

}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Ragescape pwnz j00!!”;
}
}

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1201) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "DO YOU DARE ENTER THE BLACK DRAGONS LAIR?";
					}
				}
				
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "GO THROUGH THIS DOOR TO TELEPORT TO THE BLACK DRAGON CAVE";
					}
				}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2301) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to the monkey playboy mansion";
					}
				}
									if (npcs[i].npcType == 2475) {
					if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;

					}
				}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) {

item.title: Giving co- owner to whoever helps me with my gay npc's
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

use this in your NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("NAME HERE")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner NAME HERE is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner NAME HERE is OFFLINE"; } } }

-Newb

Read full topic
